titleStmt.title: The boke of nurtur for men seruauntes, and children with Stans puer ad mensam, newelye corrected, verye vtyle and necessarye vnto all youth.
titleStmt.author: Rhodes, Hugh, fl. 1550.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by me Thomas Colwell: dwellynge in the house of Robert Wyer, beside Charing Crosse,

notesStmt.note: At end: Compyled by Hughe Rodes of the kynges Chappell.
Printer's name and address from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
For other widely differing versions of "Stans puer ad mensam", see STC 3303, 17030, 23428, and 24866.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the house of Robert Wyer, beside Charing Crosse
